* Part 2
```{r rvx, cache = TRUE}
x=rnorm(100)
median(x)
mean(x)
sd(x)
```
Analysis of the random data: 
The results are normal since they are very close to 0,0,1.
